pma:database.name: dkmhonline
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `dangky` ( `madk` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `ngaydk` date DEFAULT NULL, `hocki` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `mssv` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `mamh` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `manv` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `magv` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`madk`), KEY `mamh` (`mamh`), KEY `mssv` (`mssv`), KEY `manv` (`manv`), KEY `magv` (`magv`), CONSTRAINT `dangky_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`magv`) REFERENCES `giangvien` (`magv`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `dangky_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`mssv`) REFERENCES `sinhvien` (`mssv`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `dangky_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`mamh`) REFERENCES `monhoc` (`mamh`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `dangky_ibfk_4` FOREIGN KEY (`manv`) REFERENCES `nhanvien` (`manv`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `giangvien` ( `magv` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `pass` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `hoten` tinytext NOT NULL, `gt` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `quequan` tinytext NOT NULL, `noio` tinytext NOT NULL, `email` tinytext, `sdt` int(15) DEFAULT NULL, `avt` tinytext, `makhoa` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `manv` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`magv`) USING BTREE, KEY `makhoa` (`makhoa`), KEY `manv` (`manv`), CONSTRAINT `giangvien_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`makhoa`) REFERENCES `khoa` (`makhoa`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `giangvien_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`manv`) REFERENCES `nhanvien` (`manv`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `gvphutrachmh` ( `magv` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `mamh` varchar(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`magv`,`mamh`) USING BTREE, KEY `mamh` (`mamh`), KEY `magv` (`magv`), CONSTRAINT `gvphutrachmh_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`magv`) REFERENCES `nhanvien` (`manv`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `gvphutrachmh_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`mamh`) REFERENCES `monhoc` (`mamh`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `monhoc` ( `mamh` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `tenmh` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `manganh` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `tinchi` int(2) NOT NULL, `sotiet` int(2) NOT NULL, `thuchanh` int(2) NOT NULL, `lythuyet` int(2) NOT NULL, `doan` int(2) NOT NULL, `baitap` int(2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mamh`), KEY `manganh` (`manganh`), CONSTRAINT `monhoc_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`manganh`) REFERENCES `nganh` (`manganh`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `nganh` ( `manganh` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `tennganh` tinytext, `makhoa` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`manganh`), KEY `makhoa` (`makhoa`), CONSTRAINT `nganh_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`makhoa`) REFERENCES `khoa` (`makhoa`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `nhanvien` ( `manv` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `pass` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `hoten` tinytext NOT NULL, `gt` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `quequan` tinytext NOT NULL, `noio` tinytext NOT NULL, `email` tinytext, `sdt` int(15) DEFAULT NULL, `avt` tinytext, PRIMARY KEY (`manv`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `sinhvien` ( `mssv` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `pass` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `hoten` tinytext NOT NULL, `gt` tinytext NOT NULL, `quequan` tinytext NOT NULL, `noio` tinytext NOT NULL, `manv` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `sothich` tinytext, `avt` tinytext, `email` tinytext, `sdt` int(12) DEFAULT NULL, `manganh` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `makhoa` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `covanht` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mssv`), KEY `makhoa` (`makhoa`), KEY `manganh` (`manganh`), KEY `manv` (`manv`), KEY `covanht` (`covanht`), CONSTRAINT `sinhvien_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`covanht`) REFERENCES `giangvien` (`magv`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `sinhvien_ibfk_4` FOREIGN KEY (`manv`) REFERENCES `nhanvien` (`manv`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `sinhvien_ibfk_5` FOREIGN KEY (`makhoa`) REFERENCES `khoa` (`makhoa`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `sinhvien_ibfk_6` FOREIGN KEY (`manganh`) REFERENCES `nganh` (`manganh`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
